channel.title: Bonus experience weekend! [september 2011]
channel.description: Theres a Bonus XP weekend happening September 9th to September 12th of 2011. Get your bots ready, or get your legitness ready. Get some skills S0Ns

item.title: Bonus experience weekend! [september 2011]
item.dc:creator: @Cole1497 Cole1497
item.description:
@Cole1497 wrote:

[quote=“ox random xi, post:38, topic:411847”][quote author=Cole1497 link=topic=513105.msg3726670#msg3726670 date=1314313925]

Fuck, my members expires August 29. I’ve been waiting for double xp all summer long D:

They put double xp on the weekends when most memberships are set to expire

Greedy bastereds.

It’s a business, what do you expect?

Thought UK was different.

Different as in they don’t care about money?
[/quote]
As they aren’t greedy bastards.[/quote]
People are people. If they want more money, they’ll find a way to get it

Read full topic

item.title: Bonus experience weekend! [september 2011]
item.dc:creator: @Phaze_One Fuscate
item.description:
@Phaze_One wrote:

[quote=“Mr Mopar, post:24, topic:411847”][quote author= . link=topic=513105.msg3725374#msg3725374 date=1314229919]

  • In The Branches of Darkmeyer you can discover a brand new city and face the fearsome Vanstrom who threatens to eradicate the Myreque once and for all. This immense quest is coming to RuneScape at the end of August.
    -The Dominion Tower offers a new experience for battle-hardened players. The details are a closely guarded secret so keep your eyes on Behind the Scenes for the first glimpse of this epic update.
    -The Ritual of the Mahjarrat is the long-awaited culmination of 10 years of storyline. Experience this epic tale and work with the Temple Knights to foil Lucien’s evil plans!
    -There’s a new Slayer Dungeon on the horizon with a great atmosphere and new, interesting combat tactics, packed with new enemies to destroy and loot to acquire.
    -The next members’ Bonus XP weekend runs from 9th to the 12th of September. Looking to make a leap in your favourite skill? Gather up your resources and prepare for 99 glory!
  • Also on the horizon this autumn are the ever popular Hallowe’en and Thanksgiving holiday events, packed with seasonal cheer and additional members’ rewards.
    -Last, but by no means least, members can get in on the celebrations for 10 years of RuneScape with one last chance to gain access to RuneScape Classic.

[/quote]
Zomg[/quote]

Where did you find this?

Read full topic

@drubrkletern wrote:

If anyone wants to use my autosmelter pro, auto agility, auto miner, auto fighter, or lrk for the event, just pm me (If cole doesnt accept it on msn :o) but the autoslayer is all myne >:D

EDIT:

He doesn’t want them, pm me the one you want to use for the weekend and ill give it (If it isnt taken…)

item.title: Bonus experience weekend! [september 2011]
item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

[quote=“pot up pls, post:11, topic:411847”][quote author=Fridder link=topic=513105.msg3724804#msg3724804 date=1314197578]

Fuck, my members expires August 29. I’ve been waiting for double xp all summer long D:

The’re not that expensive. o-O

Yeah I know, it’s not a problem with money, it’s getting them. If I’m seen at the store getting a runescape pin… then I’m fucked I can’t use a credit card, I have Verizon so pay by mobile doesn’t work, and pay by house phone or whatever it’s called doesn’t work either.
The only way I can get one is prizerebel, which takes a while.
[/quote]
Yeah if i’m seen buying a pin, my mates would disown me Lol, thats why i use credit Card. D:[/quote]
What if they are going to buy cards too?

Then everyones golden.

Read full topic
